Icon Pill
Icon Pills as selection (Grouped pills)
The Icon Pill component in Skapa can be used for feedback scenarios where you would
like a user to select an instance from a group of Icon Buttons. In this case, you would
use the Grouped pills feature built-in to the component. Read more about the Icon Pill
component here.
